description: The pharmaceutical giant is accused of manslaughter after babies died, but it denies wrongdoing.
title: French firm Sanofi indicted over epilepsy drug Depakine
title_page: French firm Sanofi indicted over epilepsy drug Depakine - BBC News
maintext: Sanofi says it will fight the action at every stage because it says it did comply with its duty to inform. It is not clear if the investigation will lead to a trial.
